features: ANTI-FOG COATING: Save time and shave with anti fog mirror for shower!
TOOL FREE INSTALLATION: This fog free shower mirror adheres to any smooth non-porous surface.
ADJUSTABLE TILT: Shower mirror fogless suction and manoeuvrable ball joint feature.
CONVENIENT TO USE: This shaving mirror for shower is shatterproof and lightweight - perfect for camping.
GREAT GIFT OPTION: The anti fog shower mirror makes a fantastic gift for men and women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shower mirror, easily installs and has a sleek modern look
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Luxo shower mirror, and I can confidently say it has been a game-changer in my daily routine. This mirror has quickly become an essential part of my morning ritual, and I'm thrilled to recommend it to anyone looking for a top-quality shower mirror.What sets the Luxo shower mirror apart is its exceptional design and functionality. First and foremost, it's incredibly easy to install. The included mounting hardware and instructions made the process a breeze, and it securely adheres to my shower wall without any fuss.The size of the mirror is perfect – large enough to provide a clear view of my face but not so large that it overwhelms my shower space. The reflection is sharp and distortion-free, which is essential for getting a close and accurate shave.The Luxo shower mirror is also built to last. It's made from high-quality materials that are resistant to water and corrosion, ensuring its durability even in a humid bathroom environment.In terms of aesthetics, this mirror is sleek and modern, adding a touch of sophistication to my shower area. It complements my bathroom decor beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this mirror so my husband can shave his beard in the shower and not get all the hair all over the counter and sink. It does claim it's antifog. It does fog a little bit but if you wipe it off once then it is easy to use. The little razor holder is nice as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't fog up!
reviews.reviewText: Installed on shower glass - strong suction and so far, it hasn't fogged up at all! Wonderful price - cheap, but very well made!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice suction cup install
reviews.reviewText: It’s a mirror with a suction cup, exactly what I needed for a shave in the shower. Fogged up immediately, but wipes clear with a little soapy water no problem. Holds my razor as well! Glad to have it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great shower mirror. I've only ever had to types and I'd buy this one again. Gave 3 as Christmas gifts last year and everyone is still using them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It does the job
reviews.reviewText: I got this to replace an old warn out one I had in the past. It looks nice and the suction cup gives it a strong mount. The mirror does however fog up and I have to splash the water on it to actually clear it to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not HD quality, but works well
reviews.reviewText: Adhesive: good quality. Once you have it stuck in place, twist the bottom to lock it into place. I’ve had it up for about a month with no issues.Adjustability: there’s enough range on the swivel that allows it go almost any direction needed.Razor holder: does what it needs to.Anti-fog: well… it fogs up. But in the shower, enough condensation will build up to clear it off (ish). It’s not perfectly clear, but I can shave with it no problem. Pictures added are before shower, early shower and late shower.Overall: good buy, would recommend. No regrets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fogged Up Immediately
reviews.reviewText: Literally fogged up before I even got in the shower for the first time after setting it up and the shower wasn’t even that hot. Other “fogless mirrors” I’ve purchased in previous years usually came with a cleaning kit - this one did not so you’re just SOL on fixing or finding a remedy.10/10 don’t recommend.

Lamentablemente no se aprecia en las fotos, pero es super buen producto, yo lo puse en la ducha para rasurar barba y cabeza (soy pelon 🤣) y honestamente el tamaño de espejo es ligeramente más grande que en las fotos, lo cual eso es lo que yo buscaba, a muy pobre explicación es más grande que el rostro (cara). Tiene una movilidad excelente y buen aumento. No se empaña como un espejo normal, si se ha empañado muy poco 1 de cada 5 veces pero le arrojo agua y queda como nuevo por muuuucho tiempo. El pegamento y cupón son perfectos para agarrarse en azulejo también. Yo lo recomiendo si buscas un espejo ligeramente más grande que un rastrillo y que se vea cabeza completa de cuello para arriba.

reviews.reviewTitle: Doesn’t stick to my tile wall
reviews.reviewText: It didn’t stick to my tile wall have to silicon it there, nice little mirror though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Keeps clear in the shower, easy to attach, looks great.
